attributes.action: Do not hold a secondary vote on the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: Suppesedly it is an issue that only 1/4 of 18-25 year olds voted leave. 1/4 is not an insignificant amount, stop acting like it is. Objections that 65+ year olds mostly voted leave are also irrelevant, the youth of today are too dismissive of the wisdom of their elders and the number of times people from that age group have had the chance to vote on this. Ultimately we went through the motions and reached a conclusion. Let's not make this a best of three, eh?
attributes.background: To hold a secondary vote because the losing side demands it flies in the face of democracy itself. The moving of the goalposts will only ensure further resentment and instability. We have chosen as a people and must progress rather than spitting the dummy out of the pram because the minority lost
